resources.string: Implement AI to automatically categorize and prioritize complaints based on content and user votes, improving the response time from relevant authorities.
Incorporate game-like elements such as badges, leaderboards, and rewards for students who actively participate by submitting complaints or upvoting others issues.
Allow users to interact with a customized chatbot that can provide personalized responses to complaint status, note sharing, and placement preparation tips.
Implement a feature for students to submit, share, and access code snippets, notes, and other study materials seamlessly. This section will have a built-in code editor for direct use.
